title: Circumcision and the Commander of the Lord
summary: Joshua 5 recounts how the new generation of Israelites is circumcised at Gilgal. They celebrate the Passover, and the manna ceases. Joshua then encounters a mysterious figure—the commander of the Lord’s army.

faq.question: Why were the men circumcised?
faq.answer: Because the generation born in the wilderness had not been circumcised yet.

faq.question: Who appeared to Joshua near Jericho?
faq.answer: The commander of the Lord’s army, a divine figure representing God’s presence.
